name: Crack of Thunder
description:
Crack of Thunder is a 2D platformer and puzzler where you play as a wizard in a dungeon without much light to help. You'll have to remember what you can see in the short period where lightning strikes in order to solve the puzzles.

This game is rather short and therefore has no save functionality, it is meant to be played through in one sitting, although I have ideas to expand upon this game's core concepts if many people enjoy it.

Since the game is based around the flash of lightning strikes it is not recommended to play if you have any sensitivity to flashing lights.
